ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Most of the earlier peoples went astray before them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So had many an earlier people gone astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Before them a multitude of people of olden times had erred,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Most of the ancient people had also gone astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed before them, most of the former people went astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed most of the earlier ones went astray before them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly most of the ancients went astray before them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Before them erred most of the ancients,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily most of the men of old went astray before them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And assuredly many of the ancients went astray before them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly there went stray before them many of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Most of the former peoples went astray before them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And truly before them, many of the ancients went astray;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed most of the men of old went astray before them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: yet before them most of the ancients went astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And most of the ancients before them went astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:71] And verily most of the ancients, of past communities, went astray before them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily most of the men of old) of past generations, (went astray before them) before your folk, Muhammad. 510
